page.title: 12HOUSES-ALLSCOTT
page.content:
Some of the houses in and around Allscott date as far back as 1722.
Most of the houses in the area we are studying are of traditional brick constrction,with tile or slate roofing.However,one or two houses within our area have thatched roofs.A thatched roof is a roof made of straw which is tightly packed together. As there is a terrific fire risk with these roofs they are getting scarce. To insure these houses the people who live there need to pay quite high premiums. There has been developed a new type of thatch made from a plastic material, b ut again this is very expensive.
